name: PDFTable2Data
desc: "PDFTable2Data" is an API which could analyse and extract table data from PDF documents. The API supports multiple output formats: JSON, XML, CSV, etc.

name: 嗅金牛
desc: "嗅金牛"是北京中科数引科技有限公司旗下的一款金融大数据产品。致力于成为国内最大的金融数据服务商，专注于金融数据，共享商业价值，为客户提供数据产品及增值服务

name: 数知源
desc: "数知源"是一个数据收集、数据检索平台

name: URLMonitor
desc: "URLMonitor" is a URL monitor which could automatically and concurrently crawl the content of some websites to detect whether there are some new articles published(with crontab, Threadpool, XPath). An notification email would be sent to some specific recipients if updates are detected.
